title: Stuck in the dreaded Ghost game
body: {{summoner:6}} {{summoner:6}} {{summoner:6}} If any of you can read this, Im in account purgatory and need help. please. Free me.{{champion:56}} {{champion:56}} {{champion:56}}

replies.body: Are you still stuck in the purgatory or has Nocturne released you? If you're still having issues, let me know and I'll send out the Poro search party!
Restart your computer and login again.
